data.name: AssignmentNotFound
data.value: Assignment with branch name '{0}' for subject course '{1}' was not found. Ensure that branch name is correct. Available assignments: {2}.

data.name: ClosePullRequestWithUnratedSubmission
data.value: Warning: pull request closed and mark as inactive. Submission {0} will not be rated.

data.value: User does not have permission for changing submission.

data.value: An error occurred while processing {0} command.

data.name: InternalExceptionWhileProcessingUserCommand
data.value: An internal error occurred while processing command. Contact support for details.

data.name: MentorMergeUnratedSubmission
data.value: Submission merged by mentor and will be rated with 100.

data.name: RepositoryAssignedToAnotherUserClosePullRequest

data.name: RepositoryAssignedToAnotherUserSubmissionUpdated
data.value: Repository {0} is assigned to another student. Do not use {1} account for this repository. Submission date will be updated.

data.name: ReviewRatedSubmission
data.value: Submission is already rated with {0} points. If you want to change it, please use /update command.

data.name: ReviewWithoutRate
